div.p: Group 1 Mapping from Document Relationship Typeversion: 5.0.0) to Document Relationship Typeversion: 5.0.0)

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for ValueSet ValueSet-R5-document-relationship-type-for-R4 from FHIR R5 to FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of concepts from ValueSet `http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/document-relationship-type|5.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
